concept.title: tone
concept.shortdesc: Description of the tone supplementary matcher.

conbody.p: The tone supplementary matcher queries the detected tone of the phone. The superscript number diacritics for tone apply to all elements of a syllable. One argument is accepted denoting the allowed tones accepted, with multiple allowed values separated by a '|'. The numbers 1-9 may be used to identifiy tone type with '*' being any tone.

example.p: Search for a cluster of phones with tone 1 .:tone("1")+
